scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:stencil && npm run test:react && npm run test:react_material && npm run test:external
scripts.test:stencil: node dist/cli.js --src test/assets/icons/ --dest temp/stencil/icons/ --prefix icon --template stencil --remove-old --optimize
scripts.test:react: node dist/cli.js --src test/assets/icons/ --dest temp/react/icons/ --prefix icon --template react --remove-old --optimize
scripts.test:react_material: node dist/cli.js --src test/assets/icons/ --dest temp/react_material/icons/ --prefix icon --template react-material --remove-old --optimize
scripts.test:external: node dist/cli.js --src test/assets/icons/ --dest temp/external/icons/ --prefix icon --template test/external-template.js --remove-old --optimize
